name: Woiremose
title: Woiremose
description: An auditing tool built in NodeJS using AngularJS that allows to pull accounting data via APIs from e-conomic to map accounts within the income statement, balance sheet and tax statements. Once mapped, with only one click of a button the client can get audited annual accounts exported from the system. It takes 5 minutes rather than 10 days for an accountant!
